Perceptor::

Perceptor growled when 19 shots hit him and he fired  15 times 
against Sideswipe and 10 against Maximal city

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Orion/Sideswipe:::
> 
> ::Orion was hit by Blowpipe's shots and a few of Perceptor's 
shots.  As the 
> energy net from Surgital started coming down, Orion looked to 
Sideswipe::
> Orion: Watch out!
> ::He pushes Sideswipe aside and falls to the ground away from the 
net.  As 
> Cuttrhoat starts trying to bite at him, Orion laughs::
> Orion: Please.
> ::He fired 1 missle at Cutthroat and 1 at Triggerhappy::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sideswipe gets up from the ground and gives Orion thumbs up::
> Sideswipe: Thanks buddy!
> ::He gets hit by Perceptor's shots. He fired 2 missles at Surgital 
and 25 
> rifle shots at Perceptor::
